title: taramu gAdurA
sahitya:
taramu gAdurA raghuvara nIkidi dvaritamuga nannu brOvakuNDEti


anupallavi

  sarasija lOcana sakala lOkAvana niravadhi sukhadA nIkenduku nirdaya


caraNam    kari moralanu vini brOvalEdA munu parama bhaktuDaina prahlAduni brOvalEdA 
murahara vASudEva madana kOTi sundarA varamaina nI mahima varNImpakA taramA
